Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: SimonWoodbridge
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights vatican view family booked hotel prefer eat breakfast dinner dont usual hotel trimmings comfortable clean bed decent bathroom vatican view plus superb value location borgo pio round corner plenty cafes religious shops extra mention manager fabio friendly helpful highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Lovely, apartment style hotel in a great location.”

Reviews.Content: vatican view expect stones throw vatican perfect location exploring city located business meetings prati district restaurants nightlife trastevere hotel appears recently refurbished apartment building kitchenettes floor roof terrace top lovely spacious plenty storage space beautiful quirky furnishings roasting hot stay stayed nice cool lovely view bussling street life white shuttered windows bathroom modern fittings shower hotel restaurant bar reception door building guests keys building situated advantage please late night breakfast tea coffee facilities mineral water biscuits croissants provided free charge set similar aparthotel vatican view providing extensive facilities guests prepare own breakfasts installing minibars roof terrace missed opportunity inroom mini bars rooftop bar honesty bar nice perfect romantic weekend break rome maybe ideal business travellers

Reviews.Title: “Did not honor web site commitment”
Reviews.Author: D B
Reviews.Content: 2010 girlfriend stayed honor free night web site free airport shuttle buffet breakfast separate beds promised nor free chocolate bottle olive oil promised via web site friend sleep bed barely move buy own breakfast coffee else expected offered thank god women kept hitting elbows faucets shower cleaned toilet seat feces 2 days row seats women sit look sitting tried towels separate changed location plus close vatican nights sleep street noise window dumpsters outside window garbage truck loud empty dumpsters sleep loved italy vatican view recommend expects web offers real hotel honor

Reviews.Content: couldn’t believe luck getting positioned hotel – actually vatican – quaint modern comfortable we’ve stayed hotels standard superb – spotlessly clean crisp white sheets fluffy white towels hotel offer breakfast there’s vast amount choose eat locality coffeetea facilities fabio manager encouraged reception morning try cappuccino pleasant chatty friendly advice – probably advantage staying hotel wouldn’t hesitate staying recommended
